stages.description: The path continues through typical Highland terrain, offering excellent walking and views of the surrounding landscape.
Begin your walk from the designated parking area. The initial section follows well-marked paths through the local terrain, offering early glimpses of the landscape ahead.
Continue along the established route, following waymarkers and natural features. The path leads through varied Highland terrain typical of this region.
